channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant

item.title: CVE-2020-4663|2024-09-16T17:58:59.131Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20quality%20assistant
item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant On-Premises is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186234.

item.title: CVE-2021-29899|2024-09-16T17:43:30.969Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20quality%20assistant
item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant prior to 3.1.3 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 207413.

item.title: CVE-2020-4664|2024-09-16T17:58:14.121Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20quality%20assistant
item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Quality Assistant On-Premises is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 186235.
